vn.tki.erp.cambpm.annotation

Annotation Type EnableBpmFrame


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface EnableBpmFrame
    Add this annotation before any editor screen to turn on BpmFrame, which shows below components: Buttons to start relevant business processes
    Buttons to complete relevant pending task which assigned to current user or belong to current user's role
    Button to refresh pending tasks and
    Button to see all of running process instances which have business key contain editing entity loading info.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Fields and Description
      static java.lang.String DISABLED_FLAG_PARAM_NAME
      Set this parameter of "disableBpmFrame" to false to disable frame temporarily

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String processDefinitionActionContainerId 
      java.lang.String runningProcessActionContainerId 
      java.lang.String taskActionContainerId 
      java.lang.String taskRefreshActionContainerId 

    • Field Detail

      • DISABLED_FLAG_PARAM_NAME

        public static final java.lang.String DISABLED_FLAG_PARAM_NAME
        Set this parameter of "disableBpmFrame" to false to disable frame temporarily

    • Element Detail

      • processDefinitionActionContainerId

        public abstract java.lang.String processDefinitionActionContainerId
        Returns:
        container id for process definition start buttons. No button will show if blank
        Default:
        ""

      • runningProcessActionContainerId

        public abstract java.lang.String runningProcessActionContainerId
        Returns:
        container id for showing running process instance button. No button will show if blank
        Default:
        ""

      • taskActionContainerId

        public abstract java.lang.String taskActionContainerId
        Returns:
        container id for task completion buttons. No button will show if blank
        Default:
        ""

      • taskRefreshActionContainerId

        public abstract java.lang.String taskRefreshActionContainerId
        Returns:
        container id for pending task refreshing button. No button will show if blank
        Default:
        ""
